title: Weekend Hikers
shortDescription: Adventure with fellow hikers every weekend.
details: Perfect for nature lovers! We plan local and regional hikes and make new friends through shared adventures.

title: Foodie Friends
shortDescription: Explore new restaurants and recipes together.
details: Join us for regular meetups to try out new cuisines and share your favorite recipes.

title: Bookworms Club
details: A cozy group for those who love to read and discuss various genres of books.

title: Startup Builders
details: Connect with like-minded entrepreneurs to pitch ideas and grow startups.

title: Yoga & Wellness
shortDescription: Weekly yoga sessions and wellness tips.
details: Improve your health and mindfulness through group yoga and meditation.

title: Photography Enthusiasts
shortDescription: Share tips and go on photo walks.
details: Join our photo walks and workshops to enhance your photography skills.
